AXA is authorised and regulated by IA to carry on general insurance business in the HKSAR. The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation Limited ("HSBC") is an insurance agent authorised by HSBC Life for the distribution of <a href="/insurance/products/life/" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">life insurance products</span><span class="visuallyhidden">life insurance products  This link will open in a new window</span></a> in the HKSAR and also by AXA for the distribution of medical and general insurance products in the HKSAR. </p>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Prescribed Levy to Insurance Authority ("IA")
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_6" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Effective from 1 January 2018, the Insurance Authority ("IA") will impose a prescribed levy on your insurance policy pursuant to section 134 of the Insurance Ordinance (Cap. 41). Such levy payment should be made together with the premium payment to the insurer for direct remittance to the IA within the remittance period as specified by the IA. Subject to the applicable levy cap, the amount of levy payable for each premium payment is the amount of premium multiplied by the applicable levy rate as prescribed in the table below: </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">-   <strong>Life insurance plans</strong> - levy will be collected by HSBC Life (International) Limited ("HSBC Life") on behalf of the IA </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">-   <strong>Medical and general insurance plans</strong> - levy will be collected by AXA General Insurance Hong Kong Limited ("AXA") on behalf of the IA </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>

</div></div>

                </tr>
            
                <tr>
                    <th scope="row"><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">New terminology</p> <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">(with effect from 6 June 2016)</p></th>
                    <td><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">General Crediting Interest Rate<br></p></td>
                </tr>
            
                <tr>
                    <th scope="row"><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><span style="font-weight: 400;">General Meaning<br> </span></p></th>
                    <td><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The rate of interest credited to the Account Value of the policy upon expiry of any Guaranteed Crediting Interest Rate Lock period; and to the Account Value in relation to all premiums paid into the policy subsequent to the First Premium.<br></p></td>
                </tr>
            
            <tr aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1" class="hidden-row">
                <th></th>
                <td></td>
            </tr>
        
            
                <tr>
                    <th scope="row"><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Terminology currently used (if applicable)<br> </span></p></th>
                    <td class="cellWhite"><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Guaranteed Interest Rate Lock<br></p></td>
                </tr>
            
                <tr>
                    <th scope="row"><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">New terminology</p> <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">(with effect from 6 June 2016)</p></th>
                    <td><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Guaranteed Crediting Interest Rate Lock<br></p></td>
                </tr>
            
                <tr>
                    <th scope="row"><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><span style="font-weight: 400;">General Meaning<br> </span></p></th>
                    <td><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The mechanism for guaranteeing a fixed rate of interest for a period of time.<br></p></td>
                </tr>
            
            <tr aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1" class="hidden-row">
                <th></th>
                <td></td>
            </tr>
        
            
                <tr>
                    <th scope="row"><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Terminology currently used (if applicable)<br> </span></p></th>
                    <td class="cellWhite"><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Guaranteed Interest Rate Lock Rate / Interest Rate for the Guaranteed Interest Rate Lock Period<br></p></td>
                </tr>
            
                <tr>
                    <th scope="row"><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">New terminology</p> <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">(with effect from 6 June 2016)</p></th>
                    <td><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Crediting Interest Rate for the Guaranteed Crediting Interest Rate Lock Period<br></p></td>
                </tr>
            
                <tr>
                    <th scope="row"><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><span style="font-weight: 400;">General Meaning<br> </span></p></th>
                    <td><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The rate of interest credited to the Account Value of the policy in relation to the First Premium paid into the policy.<br></p></td>
                </tr>
            
            <tr aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1" class="hidden-row">
                <th></th>
                <td></td>
            </tr>
        
            
                <tr>
                    <th scope="row"><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Terminology currently used (if applicable)<br> </span></p></th>
                    <td class="cellWhite"><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Guaranteed Minimum Crediting Rate<br></p></td>
                </tr>
            
                <tr>
                    <th scope="row"><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">New terminology</p> <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">(with effect from 6 June 2016)</p></th>
                    <td><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Guaranteed Minimum Crediting Interest Rate<br></p></td>
                </tr>
            
                <tr>
                    <th scope="row"><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><span style="font-weight: 400;">General Meaning<br> </span></p></th>
                    <td><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The minimum rate of interest credited to the Account Value.<br></p></td>
                </tr>

            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_9">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="customer-feedback"></div>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Customer enquiries, feedback or complaints
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_12" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Your feedback is important to us in maintaining our service quality. If you have any enquiries, feedback or complaints related to the Bank’s insurance products or services, please contact us via the following channels:</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Call us</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Life Insurance Service Hotline: (852) 2583 8000<strong></strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Write to us</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Mail: 18/F, Tower 1, HSBC Centre, 1 Sham Mong Road, Kowloon, Hong Kong<br> Email: <a href="mailto:hsbclifeenquiry@hsbc.com.hk">hsbclifeenquiry@hsbc.com.hk</a></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can also send us your enquiries or feedback by completing our online form on our website or online banking and we will provide a response soon.<br>  </p> 
<p class="A-PAR22R-RW-ALL"><strong>Resolving your complaint</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong><br> Getting back to you</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We will acknowledge your message and aim to resolve most issues within five working days. Occasionally, we may need more time but we will keep you informed.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Handling your complaint</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Your complaint will be dealt with in total confidence by employees with the appropriate experience and authority, and who are not directly involved in the issue.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If a complaint is raised by a third party, we will get back to you to protect your privacy.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We will offer appropriate redress if your complaint is upheld, but this will not necessarily involve</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>If you’re not satisfied</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you are not entirely satisfied with the way we have handled you complaint, you have the right to refer the matter to the relevant organizations listed below and we will fully cooperate with them in the handling of complaints:</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Insurance Authority</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Mail: 19/F, 41 Heung Yip Road, Wong Chuk Hang, Hong Kong<br> Hotline: (852) 3899 9983<br> Fax: (852) 3753 3812<br> Email: <a href="mailto:complaints@ia.org.hk">complaints@ia.org.hk</a></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The Insurance Complaints Bureau</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Mail: 29/F, Sunshine Plaza, 353 Lockhart Road, Wanchai, Hong Kong<br> Hotline: (852) 2520 2728<br> Fax: (852) 2520 1967<br> Email: <a href="mailto:icb.enquiry@icb.org.hk">icb.enquiry@icb.org.hk</a></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Insurance Agents Registration Board</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Mail: 29/F, Sunshine Plaza, 353 Lockhart Road, Wanchai, Hong Kong<br> Hotline: (852) 2520 1868<br> Fax: (852) 2520 1967<br> Email: <a href="mailto:hkfi@hkfi.org.hk">hkfi@hkfi.org.hk</a></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The Hong Kong Confederation of Insurance Brokers</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Mail: Room 3407, AIA Tower, 183 Electric Road, Fortress Hill, Hong Kong<br> Hotline: (852) 2882 9943<br> Fax: (852) 2890 2137<br> Email: <a href="mailto:info@hkcib.org">info@hkcib.org</a></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Professional Insurance Brokers Association</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Mail: Room 2507- 8, 25/F, China Insurance Group Building, 141 Des Voeux Road Central, Central, Hong Kong<br> Hotline: (852) 2869 8515<br> Fax: (852) 2770 2372<br> Email: <a href="mailto:info@piba.org.hk">info@piba.org.hk</a></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For enquiries, feedback or complaints related to ORSO, please <a href="/orso/#contactus" target="_self">click here for details</a>.<br> </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_10">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="notice-relating"></div>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Data Privacy Notice
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_13" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/insurance/notice-relating-to-the-personal-data-privacy-ordinance.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">https://www.hsbc.com.hk/insurance/misc/data-privacy-notice/</span><span class="visuallyhidden">https://www.hsbc.com.hk/insurance/misc/data-privacy-notice/  This link will open in a new window</span></a></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You may be subject to an earlier version of this privacy notice (known as <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/insurance/life/notice-of-changes/personal-data-ordinance.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Notice to Customers relating to the Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Notice to Customers relating to the Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance View PDF This link will open in a new window</span></a>) if you have not consented to subsequent changes to the earlier notice.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Note:</p> 
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">In case of any discrepancies between the English and Chinese versions, the English version shall apply and prevail.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">This notice may also be referred to as "Personal Information Collection Statement".</span><br> </p>
</div></div>
